name: AMERICAN LIGHTING ASSOCIATION
description: Association representing the interests of the residential and retail lighting industries.
sampleDescriptions: Issues affecting the decorative lighting, ceiling fan and controls industries in the areas of healthcare, labor, tax and trade, including the extension of the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.
